about_the_game:
Prepare for an offroad adventure... and realize that you're not prepared enough.

In Offroad Survival you take a trip of your dreams and you only have a single task - reach your destination. No matter what happens.



Analyze the roads ahead and choose your paths wisely. Each road has different challenges. Some are easy but lengthy and will drain your supplies quickly. Others might be tempting shortcuts that pose unique dangers and a real risk to you or your vehicle.



Enjoy the beautiful scenery and forget about all your worries... until you run into unexpected challenges as your navigation leads you into places you never thought you'd find. Cut off from the world, find a way to stock up on essentials before continuing your journey.



Solve a mystery, as a chain of events leads you further away from your original plans. Adapt to the changing circumstances as you struggle to progress toward your destination.

Features

  • Expansive open world with different biomes
  • Branching paths that pose different challenges
  • Resource & inventory management - including foraging
  • Beautiful, atmospheric graphics
  • Various tools that let you clear impassable roads
  • Realistic offroad driving
  • Story mode
  • Mystery that affects your journey

short_description: Survive a journey of a lifetime... if you can! Choose the best roads to reach your destination. Drive across difficult terrain. Obtain essential resources in any way you can. Solve a mystery and avoid a grim fate as you face unexpected challenges that cut you off from the rest of the world.
